Costco, please stand firm in maintaining your commitment to DEI. My husband and I have been loyal Costco customers for nearly 40 years. We regularly shop at Costco both at our local warehouse and online. In appreciation for your commitment to DEI and to your other ethical business practices, we will be making a point to use Costco for even more of our shopping needs than we previously have. We also plan to invest in Costco as shareholders. Thank you for being the kind of business we have been proud to support for the past four decades.

Being in my mid ninety’s I have seen a lot of things come and go.From the little family grocery stores,hardware stores,furniture stores,small 2 pump service stations are all distant memories to a person in their mid ninety’s.One of my many pleasures in life is shopping at my local Costco.I am still able to drive myself and buy my gas at Costco.A fun place to shop and save money.

Visiting Costco for their great merchandise, great prices and oh so friendly service and ethics! And I love the wonderful way you treat your employees with great wages and benefits. You are what all companies should strive to be!

Thank you for standing tall and doing the right thing during a time when it is more popular for businesses to turn their backs on our shared values and the parts of their businesses that have helped to establish them as trusted brands with their customers. Grateful to you for holding the line and giving us a preferred place to shop as options continue to shrink!
Thank you, Costco, for standing up for diversity, equity, and inclusion. You have become our first choice retailer because of that commitment (and the ways you support employees).

Thank you for doing what’s right, even when it’s not lucrative or popular.
